SEARCH

Interface PassengerInterface

All Superinterfaces:
TravelPackage
All Known Implementing Classes:
AdjustBalance, CheckBalSufficient, ParentPassenger, PrintPassenger
public interface PassengerInterface extends TravelPackage
The PassengerInterface interface extends the TravelPackage interface and provides additional methods related to passengers within a travel package.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    adjust_balance(String action, Passenger person, Activity activity)
    Adjusts the balance of a specified passenger based on a given action and activity.
    boolean
    check_balance_sufficient(Passenger person, Activity activity)
    Checks if the balance of a specified passenger is sufficient for a given activity.
    void
    print_details(Passenger person, Package P)
    Prints the details of a specified passenger and package.

  • Method Details

    • print_details

      void print_details(Passenger person, Package P)
      Prints the details of a specified passenger and package.
      Parameters:
      person - The passenger whose details are to be printed.
      P - The package associated with the passenger.

    • check_balance_sufficient

      boolean check_balance_sufficient(Passenger person, Activity activity)
      Checks if the balance of a specified passenger is sufficient for a given activity.
      Parameters:
      person - The passenger whose balance is to be checked.
      activity - The activity for which the balance is to be checked.
      Returns:
      True if the balance is sufficient, otherwise false.

    • adjust_balance

      void adjust_balance(String action, Passenger person, Activity activity)
      Adjusts the balance of a specified passenger based on a given action and activity.
      Parameters:
      action - The action to be performed, either "deduct" or "refund".
      person - The passenger whose balance is to be adjusted.
      activity - The activity for which the balance is to be adjusted.
